scripts.copy-query-builder-sources: cp node_modules/typesafe-query-builder/package.json dist/typesafe-query-builder.package.json.txt && cp node_modules/typesafe-query-builder/dist/index.d.ts dist/typesafe-query-builder.index.d.ts.txt && cp node_modules/typesafe-query-builder/dist/index.js dist/typesafe-query-builder.index.mjs && cp node_modules/typesafe-query-builder/dist/index.js.map dist/typesafe-query-builder.index.mjs.map && sed -i s/sourceMappingURL=index.js.map/sourceMappingURL=typesafe-query-builder.index.mjs.map/ dist/typesafe-query-builder.index.mjs
scripts.build: tsc && vite build && npm run copy-playground-sources && npm run copy-query-builder-sources
